trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_SEQ_00<tab>Though you and Krile both have news to share, hers is perhaps the more urgent.

TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_SEQ_01<tab>Much and more has occurred during your sojourn to the First. Krile and Tataru offer a brief summary of the Forum's recent activities─of particular note, the plan to relocate Thavnairian refugees to Garlemald. Having learned of the device within the Tower of Babil, the Forum intends to utilize it to teleport them to the moon. Several of the Scions traveled to Camp Broken Glass to serve as an escort for the refugees, but have fallen out of contact since shortly after their arrival. Krile fears that the Final Days have come to Garlemald, and that your allies have come under attack, and so she urges you to rush to their aid.

TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_SEQ_02<tab>At Camp Broken Glass, Lucia informs you that while the Forum's airship has apparently landed safely on the Magna Glacies, the skies above Garlemald were set ablaze moments later, signifying the advent of the Final Days in Ilsabard. You race to the ice field to find your comrades and the remnants of the Ist Legion locked in fierce combat with hordes of ravenous beasts.

TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_SEQ_03<tab>Though you succeed in averting an all-out massacre, your respite is interrupted by the unexpected arrival of none other than Zenos. However, he expresses no desire to pit himself against you this day, and after an exchange of words with Jullus and Alisaie, he departs, unwilling to vie with the Final Days for your attention. Returning to more immediate matters, it is then decided that you will all accompany Fourchenault to Camp Broken Glass, where he is to make a formal introduction to Lucia.

TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_SEQ_04<tab>Reaching the camp, you take a moment to listen to Alisaie's thoughts on her encounter with Zenos. While her impassioned outburst came entirely in the heat of the moment, she does not regret her choice of words. Nor should she, for if his declarations are to be believed, he cares not a whit what anyone says or thinks─save you.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Lucia at Camp Broken Glass.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Lucia at Camp Broken Glass.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TATARU_000_000<tab>You've a knack for turning up <var 1A 02 /var>exactly<var 1A 01 /var> when needed, and this is no exception!
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_010<tab>So, have you learned aught more of the Final Days?
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_011<tab>Then the journey was well worth the risk. No doubt your newfound knowledge will be a great boon to us all.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_012<tab>Unfortunately, during your time on the First, events here have taken a turn for the worse.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_013<tab>The Scions are running themselves ragged trying to contain the spread of blasphemies, but it's a losing battle.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TATARU_000_014<tab>To try and ascertain the where and why of it, Alisaie and Alphinaud have been traveling all over...
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TATARU_000_015<tab>Of all the regions they've visited, Locus Amoenus is one of the worst affected.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TATARU_000_016<tab>Thancred, Estinien, and G'raha took a detachment of allied soldiers there to offer aid and succor to those in need.

TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TATARU_000_017<tab>But the province is vast. They only managed to visit a handful of coastal villages! It was an accomplishment worth celebrating, still, but a drop in the bucket at best...
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_018<tab>In the meantime, Y'shtola and Master Matoya have been making a concerted effort to establish contact with Hydaelyn in the aetherial sea, but to no avail.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_019<tab>As for Tataru and I, we've been keeping a close eye on the Forum.

TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_020<tab>From what we gather, they've been constructing a vessel to ferry people to the moon. An ambitious project that has likely been years, if not decades in the making. However, since we've seen no sign of it thus far, I suspect it's still incomplete.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_021<tab>You will also recall the proposal issued by Master Fourchenault to the people of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_022<tab>Following their discussion, Vrtra declared his support for the plan and urged those who wished to evacuate to accept the Forum's invitation.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_023<tab>So far, so good. But that's where things get a little strange...

TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_024<tab>Apparently, the Forum caught wind of the lunar teleporter in the Tower of Babil, and decided to use it to deliver people to the moon instead of their mysterious ship.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TATARU_000_025<tab>Therefore, to secure safe passage for the Hannish refugees to the tower, Alphinaud, Alisaie, Estinien, and G'raha traveled to Garlemald not long ago.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TATARU_000_026<tab>Trouble is, the capital was hardly the safest place to begin with, and now...
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_027<tab>...The Final Days have come to Garlemald.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_028<tab>Shortly after our friends arrived, they were sent to rendezvous with Master Fourchenault. Then, panic broke out, and our communications were severed.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_029<tab>From what fragments we were able to make out before the linkshell went completely silent, we can only assume the phenomenon has spread to the capital.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_030<tab>The others need you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Please, you must help them!
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_031<tab>Having you there will make all the difference. I'm sure of it.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TATARU_000_032<tab>Camp Broken Glass was their first port of call, so you'd best start there.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TATARU_000_033<tab>Hopefully, Lucia will know where they are!
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_034<tab>There's no telling what you'll be walking into, so you had best take every possible precaution.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_KRILE_000_040<tab>I'll be sure to let Thancred and Y'shtola know you're back. At least <var 1A 02 /var>they're<var 1A 01 /var> still responding to their linkpearls.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_TATARU_000_045<tab>It pains me to send you off alone into unknown peril after you've only just returned, but Twelve willing, you won't be alone for long.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_LUCIA_000_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... And not a moment too soon.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_LUCIA_000_051<tab>The skies over Garlemald are ablaze, but it's events on the ground that concern me.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_LUCIA_000_052<tab>As you will have heard, your fellow Scions arrived ahead of you.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_LUCIA_000_053<tab>We cut the customary greetings short after we received word from our troops on the Magna Glacies that the Forum's airship had landed.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_LUCIA_000_054<tab>It was then that the heavens began to burn...
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_LUCIA_000_055<tab>I dispatched your friends at once to ensure the refugees come to no harm.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_LUCIA_000_056<tab>I would have you join them immediately. Additional support is en route, but we will discuss them later. I trust you are ready to depart?

TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>Upon departing for the Magna Glacies, several cutscenes will play in sequence. It is recommended that you set aside sufficient time to view these scenes in their entirety.

TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_SYSTEM_000_058<tab>In addition, you will be required to participate in battle. Your progress will be saved at certain points. In the event that you are defeated, you will be able to try again from the most recent of these.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>Please note that if you enter battles associated with other quests or log out from the game, this progress will be lost.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>You must be a Disciple of War or Magic of level 88 or above to proceed.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>That the Final Days should manifest here too, after everything these people have suffered, is a fate cruel beyond words.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_ALPHINAUD_000_071<tab>Nevertheless, with allies old and new at our side, there is yet reason to be hopeful.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_GRAHATIA_000_075<tab>Though there'll be time later to discuss your journey to the First, there is one thing I must ask.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_GRAHATIA_000_076<tab>Did you perchance speak with our friends in the Crystarium?
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_GRAHATIA_000_077<tab>Lyna and Beq Lugg <var 1A 02 /var>both<var 1A 01 /var> warn me against overexerting myself?
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_GRAHATIA_000_078<tab>Strange that they would express such similar sentiments─identical, in fact─but their advice is duly noted.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_ESTINIEN_000_080<tab>We couldn't save them all, but if we'd arrived any later, it would've been a massacre.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_ESTINIEN_000_081<tab>Things were looking bleak until you and the Ist turned up.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_FOURCHENAULT_000_085<tab>This is the contingent's base of operations, I take it?
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_LUCIA_000_090<tab>At the very least, I am glad our own members are accounted for.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_JULLUS_000_095<tab>It's been a while since last we spoke. For some time, I was...not myself.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_JULLUS_000_096<tab>Lucia and the others told me what happened that night...and about the events that took place while I was receiving treatment.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_JULLUS_000_097<tab>It was only then that I realized the lengths you and yours go to... I know I might never be able to repay you, but I'll be damned if I don't try.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_JULLUS_000_098<tab>And most of all... I want to thank you. All of you. For everything you've done and continue to do for the sake of my people.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_ALISAIE_000_100<tab>To see Zenos standing there, so uncaring and unrepentant. Gods, I don't know what came over me.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_ALISAIE_000_101<tab>I just blurted out the first thing that came to mind. But looking back on it...I stand by those words.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_ALISAIE_000_102<tab>I would say I hope they won't incite him to further villainy, but to be honest, I doubt he even remembers what I said.
TEXT_AKTKMF101_04439_ALISAIE_000_103<tab>Anyway, enough about all that. It's good to see you again!
